invocations.description: Returns the name of the type of a special area.
invocations.ex:
if getareatype('SpecialArea1') == AREA_SQUARE_FILLED then
	setareatype('SpecialArea1', AREA_SQUARE_BORDER)
end
invocations.exDescription: It'll change the 'SpecialArea1' type from 'Square (Filled)' to 'Square (Border Only)'.
